page.title: 07SPORTS AND RECREATION.
page.content: A lot of adults spend a good part of their leisure time either taking part in or watching sport. We found that swimming and tennis are the most popular sports that people in Platt participate in. Next came badminton for adults and horse riding fo children. Most adults spent one to three hours a week doing sport, although many spent between four and seven hours a week. Most sport played by adults was played outside Platt because of the lack of sporting facilities within it. There is for example no football ground, swimming pool or sports centre. People who watch sport mostly watch it on television although some people do go and watch sport "live". e.g. they watch live football, cricket, horse riding and tennis.
